comment:
Your friend, my brother, standing by me in moments of joy and, more importantly, in tough times. Among the many individuals I've encountered, he is my favourite one not just at IIT Indore but in my life as well.
Pro tip:- Arjun ko patane ke liye all you need is 2 TIGER CRUNCH BISCUIT. ❤️💪
name: Aman Mandawat

comment: Your knack for cracking dark jokes always keeps me laughing and on my toes even when you're teasing me to the brink of irritation . Thank you for your unwavering support through the toughest of the times and being there through it all. Here's to more laughter and more of your playful banter!! ♥♥
name: Neyasha Sinha

comment:
Bhai cut ka bol ke din me 2+3 samose khaana🙇
Muzaffarnagar ka mota bhai. Gym me kya karna h sikhane ke liye thanks but tere jaisa bulk nhi ho payega🐽
See you on the other side brother
name: Nikhil Raizada

comment: Arjun (Suvar) our official meme maker. Bhai tere jokes pe itni jyada hasi nahi ati jitni at moment tere expression par😂.. But tbh you are the most calm person I’ve ever seen. Jo last moment pe tune panic less kam kare hai har bar…hats-off to you man🫡. Milte rehena bhai…aur ek bar toh trip challe😂
name: Shubham Pednekar

comment: One of the most funny guy I've ever met. Your a brother, gym coach to me. Gym mai bkc krne ke nye nye ideas leke aana, late night reels session sb yaad rhega😂. Aur bhai cut to hota rahega bulk krte abhi 💪
name: Prashant Kumar

comment: Bulking is what I learnt from you. I wish you be the most powerful guy in any gym you go. Was great to have your company. You never felt like a junior but always a Bro by the side.  I wish you all the strength n success. I hope the cutting is insane. Keep grinding and may the force  be with you !!🤝
name: Prasad Chaudhari

comment: Aur Arjun boht dino se kuch bakchodi nahi ki h.Tujhse jyada bakchodi kisi n nahi ki h mere sath😂 but I miss those online sem time.Yaha aakr to gym m jyada busy hogya tu😂 Anyways always stay like you are!
name: Pranjali Gavhale

comment: APJ kaa Keechak. Kaafi yaadgar pal rahe hain saath me jaise Khel Diwas, Diwali, Gym me bakchodi, Hostel me bomb fodna, ityaadi. Humesha aise hi bakchodi kaat te rehnaa
name: Prakhar Gautam

comment: Apna online wala meme team up was the best time for me in online sems. May be mai gym jata hota to or acche se bond krpaate yha campus m v but koi ni 🙂. Teri bkc or tujhe hmesha yaad rkhunga. Stay happy and same Bhai. Best wishes for future. 🙌
name: Himanshu Gupta

comment: Wo banda jo group ki vibe hi alag set kar deta hai! The one who constantly crack jokes, roasts you, which all becomes soo fun kyuki ye dil ka bahaut accha hai. You cant get bored agar tum Arjun ke saath ho. Cutting me 1 apple and 1 kela khaane waala ( after 2 samosas😂) . HYD me bkc waiting. ATB!
name: Aditya Handa

comment: Online m khoob bkc ki h apan ne Stickers banane ek doosre k💀, shayari banani, groups par bkc krna, ek doosre ka majak banana, boht maja aaya, or aage bhi bkc karte rhenge🤝 mujhe gym sikhane k liye dhanyavad, teri batayi hui exercise hi krta hu😂. Dil ka acha banda h tu. All the best for future.
name: Sanskar Verma

comment: Bro never hesitates. Humesha kisi na kisi ko troll karte rahega but nevertheless gem of a person. All the best for future, milte Hyderabad mai!
name: Harsh Verma

comment: Online meme maker😂 Gym bro, dikhta full gunda hai par bohot accha banda hai. Aage ke liye all the best bro🤝
name: Govind Kizhakke Mepad

comment: We both need to start cutting bro.....
name: Abhishek k

comment: Bharosa rakh bro, cut karunga kal se !!!
name: Shubham Pednekar
